response.raw:
Here is the memo:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To: Customer Service Team
From: [Your Name], Senior Customer Service Representative
Date: [Current Date]
Subject: Responding to Customer Inquiries and Claim Investigations

When contacting customers to respond to their inquiries or notify them about claim investigation results or planned adjustments, please follow these guidelines:
• Acknowledge their inquiry and thank them for contacting Customer Service
• Clearly explain the results of any claim investigations and the rationale behind the findings
• Detail any planned adjustments and how they will impact the customer's account or service
• Provide next steps for the customer and who they can contact if they have additional questions or concerns
• Maintain a professional, helpful tone and reiterate our commitment to customer satisfaction
• Document all customer interactions in the CRM system

Please let me know if you have any questions. Thank you for your continued dedication to providing excellent customer service and promptly responding to our valued customers.
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
